author: Columbia Fire Deparment
title: Drone footage shows impact of tornado in Columbia, TN | Flipboard
text: The National Weather Service, as well as local first responders, estimate the tornado touched down at approximately 5:45 p.m. Wednesday evening along the Bear Creek Pike area in northern Columbia, leaving a path of destruction that amassed to about two miles wide.
